verses.kjv: The LORD is my shepherd; I shall not want.
verses.web: LORD is my shepherd: I shall lack nothing.
verses.ct: The LORD is my shepherd — I have everything I need.

verses.kjv: He maketh me to lie down in green pastures: he leadeth me beside the still waters.
verses.web: He makes me lie down in green pastures. He leads me beside still waters.
verses.ct: He lets me rest in green meadows and leads me to peaceful streams.

verses.kjv: He restoreth my soul: he leadeth me in the paths of righteousness for his name’s sake.
verses.web: He restores my soul. He guides me in the paths of righteousness for his name’s sake.
verses.ct: He refreshes my soul and guides me along right paths for the sake of his name.

verses.kjv: Yea, though I walk through the valley of the shadow of death, I will fear no evil: for thou art with me; thy rod and thy staff they comfort me.
verses.web: Even though I walk through the valley of the shadow of death, I will fear no evil, for you are with me. Your rod and your staff, they comfort me.
verses.ct: Even though I walk through the valley of the shadow of death, I will fear no evil, for you are with me. Your rod and your staff — they comfort me.

verses.kjv: Thou preparest a table before me in the presence of mine enemies: thou anointest my head with oil; my cup runneth over.
verses.web: You prepare a table before me in the presence of my enemies. You anoint my head with oil. My cup runs over.
verses.ct: You prepare a table for me in the presence of my enemies. You anoint my head with oil, and my cup overflows.

verses.kjv: Surely goodness and mercy shall follow me all the days of my life: and I will dwell in the house of the LORD for ever.
verses.web: Surely goodness and loving kindness shall follow me all the days of my life, and I will dwell in LORD’s house forever.
verses.ct: Surely goodness and mercy will follow me all the days of my life, and I will dwell in the house of the LORD forever.
